doc.field: Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)
Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)

The development series consists of 18 linear inches arranged according to Hester's original numbering system. Development's responsibilities included fundraising efforts for the University either through foundations and wealthy individuals. Boxes 38 and 39 contain correspondence and press releases concerning the 25 million dollar grant from the Ford Foundation. Reports from NYU to Ford were separated into their own collection (RG 15.4). Box 40 contains correspondence with the Rockefeller Foundation, Standard Oil, John B. Snow, and the U.S. Government. Box 41 contains correspondence with Xerox and Alumni.
Records of the Office of the President (Dr. James McNaughton Hester)
